Title: Relates to disorderly conduct
Summary: Adds offenses to disorderly conduct, including urination and defecation in a public place; smoking any substance in a prohibited area; possessing an open container of alcohol in a public place; smoking marijuana in a public place; or disobeying signage, including but not limited to, printed notices and placards, in any municipal or state park.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the penal law, in relation to disorderly conduct
